title: annai enavE
sahitya:
annai enavE aNaittu Adarittu endanadu innishaip-paNikkut-tuNai IndaruL murugA


anupallavi

  unnaittAn nambinEn urutuNai pera nAn enbadai arindu nI endaniDam parindu


caraNam    ponnaiyum poruLaiyum bhOga sukham edaiyum peTriDum pErAshai uTravai kOravillai
innishaip-paNgaLAl menmElum pugazh pADi shentamizh annai magizha sheyya munaiyum ennai
